title: I've tried every connection problem fix that you guys posted for encountering the "Unsuccessful log"
body:
I've tried every single fix but none seems to work, please can I get an answer back asap.

I've been trying to update to patch 6.20 but it won't let me, it stops at 33% and pops up with Unsuccessful message, check logs.

Please help.

replies.body:
Have you tried the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? At 33%, the patcher is attempting to grab actual files from the patching servers, so drops in your connection are the common cause for issues.

Let me know if those steps helped or if you've already tried them before posting this.
Yes,  sorry for not making it clear but what I meant was that I have tried all of those and none of have worked for me. Please help.

Thanks for clarifying. Since the basic guides didn't resolve this, we'll need to escalate this to our tech specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run a set of [Hextech Logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket, it will expedite your service.

Let me know if you have any questions.
